title: Left Mouse Click
body:
I was messing with in game settings then-

Problem:
Can't left click anything except shop items. Can't move map, click on shop, or check items/hp with MB1, left click.

Extra Information:
I can move the map and click on things like I normally do with the mouse scroll button.
I've tried resetting all settings to default.
I've deleted the input in the config folder
I can do things normally on other accounts.

replies.body:
It sounds super strange that a change in your in-game settings could cause all of that happen.  I could see it happening if modifications to the config files were changed, but I'd like to help get this fixed either way.  You were on the right track in deleting the input file, but in order to reset your settings to a fresh state it will be necessary to delete the whole folder:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Hopefully, that will get things working on!
